summary: Dhaka, the capital of Bangladesh, is a huge and crowded city with over 10 million people. It's one of the world's most densely populated places. Dhaka has a long history, dating back to the Mughal Empire when it was a prosperous trading center known for its beautiful architecture. Under British rule, it grew even more with modern additions. Today, Dhaka is a major global city, the heart of Bangladesh's politics, economy, and culture. It's famous for its food, art, and unique landmarks like the Jatiyo Sangshad Bhaban.
title: Dhaka
